alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 02 at 3:55PM EST until February 04 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Several inches of snow and sleet and ice accumulations of a tenth to quarter on an inch. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Northern Wayne, Bradford and Susquehanna counties. In New York, Delaware county. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light mixed precipitation will move into the region tonight into Thursday morning. The main round of snow, sleet, and freezing rain will be Thursday night through Friday morning. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. &&
